data.text:
@KLM I purchased a seat upgrade for a flight on your site but it’s not appearing. Called & I am told to call 
@Delta since they’re operating the flight. DL has no way of knowing I’ve paid for the upgrade. You can’t take my $ and not deliver. Y’all got a couple hrs to rectify this

data.text: Not only is 84 Lumber matching your dollar donations, but @Delta is matching your Skymiles donation! Up to 10 million miles! #GivingTuesday

data.text: @coryleetweets @Delta @ATLairport @GMA @abcnews Please DM me - I want to do an interview for @ability_media_ https://t.co/Q8bpbA8k0m

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Good Morning America
entity.description: Co-anchors report the morning's top headlines from a set in Times Square. The show features a combination of breaking news, interviews, in-depth reporting and weather. The program covers important issues with key figures from around the world and a wide spectrum of topics, including medicine, finance, consumer issues, computer technology, education and gardening.
